transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hi good morning ma'am, Vasundhara bol rahi hu IndiaMART se. Dena mam kaise help kar sakti hu?
Customer: Wo apna humne 24 25 hai na 2024 25 mein aapke andar wo TDS bhara tha aur wo uska complaint bhi dala tha ki hume wo paisa refund chahiye uska certificate bhi dala tha.
Customer: Wo bhai ne bataya tha ki bank details bhi dal dena to humne wo bhi dala tha.
Customer: Usne bataya ki one week ya two week mein aa jayega aisa process hoga tabhi aa jayega lekin wo abhi tak aaya nahi.
Executive: Ek minute ma'am, mai check kar leti hu ek second. Wo apna Bhanu Pratap hai koi unse hi baat kar rahi hai?
Customer: Ha ha Bhanu Bhanu.
Executive: Hmm hmm, ek minute. 311 ko apna baat hua tha wo mail bhi dala tha.
Executive: Abhi wo mai Bhanu Pratap ko call kar rahi hu na wo receive hi nahi kar rahe.
Executive: Ma'am wo abhi available nahi hai aapki jo company hai wo abhi koi aur take care kar raha hai Vidushi take care kar rahi hai.
Customer: Ha isliye ek second rukiye.
Executive: Ma'am ek baar aap check kijiyega I think aapka refund ho gaya hai kya?
Customer: Nahi hua isliye na wo bank mein bhi nahi show hua.
Executive: Bank deal aapne kaise diye the aapko aap aapne Bhanu ko diye the?
Customer: Nahi wo customer care mein hi dala tha.
Executive: Accha ma'am customer care. Usne bola ki aapka aapka jo app hota hai na usme PAN card bhi dal dena. Wo char number aata hai na wo app mein char number bhi dalwaya tha usne.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Ma'am ek kaam kariye aap ek number note kar lijiye mera. Mai ek baar dobara se waise refund ki aapki entry to generate ho gayi thi. To aapka mai refund generate ke liye ticket open kar deti hu. Aap ek baar number note kariye mera ispe aap mujhe ek baar na PAN card aur apna wo jo bank deal bol rahe hai aap wo bhej dijiye mai ek baar karwa deti hu isko.
Customer: Ha bole na number. Number note kijiye 78274
Customer: 78
Executive: 274
Customer: 274
Executive: 36
Customer: 36
Executive: 804 ha.
Customer: 804 mai repeat karti hu number 7824 274 36 804
Executive: Ha ma'am thik hai ye hai na number ha isi pe aap mujhe bhej dijiyega. Thik hai aapka mai yaha pe ticket open mera naam Vasundhara hai.
Customer: Vasundhara. Aap par is number pe bhej dijiyega ha accounts ka number hai ye.
Executive: Okay thank you ma'am. Hai na ha ma'am. Thik hai iske alawa ma'am mujhe thoda service se related bhi mujhe baat karni thi ki Bhanu ne to kafi time ho gaya hai abhi wo hai nahi hai unka promotion ho gaya tha. To abhi jo services hai wo aapki Vidushi take care kar rahi hai. Thik hai to abhi mujhe ye bataiye ki aapke yaha services lead wagera jo aa rahi hai kya feedback hai lead ka kaisa response aa raha hai apna lead pe direct inquiry pe?
Customer: Ha lekin abhi to kam ho raha hai aisa.
Executive: Matlab kam ho raha hai aapka wo call ha ho to raha hai lekin jyada nahi aata aisa.
Executive: Jyada nahi aa raha hai. Accha matlab ab tak jise apni services ko host hue almost kafi time ho chuka hai. To kaisa conversion nikal ke aa raha hai deals kitni convert ho jati hai mahine mein ma'am apni?
Customer: Wo to kaise bata sakte hai wo apna sir hai na wo wahi bata sakenge aapko. Jaise ki main number liya tha.
Executive: Nahi jaise ki aapka deal conversion matlab ki 10% deal convert ho rahi hai 5% ho rahi hai. Matlab positive buyers nikal ke aa rahe hai mera puchne ka matlab ye hai.
Customer: Lekin wo to apna sir hi bata sakte hai.
Customer: Wo wala number hai na wo 88 wala number.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Wahi wala ha unse baat kijiye na wo service ke regarding unse baat kijiye.
Executive: Accha to accha aap services bhi accha aap services nahi take care karte ho ma'am?
Customer: Nahi wo thoda bahut karti hu lekin jyada.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai koi baat nahi service ke liye mai unse baat kar lungi. Baki ka aapko fir mai ye bolungi ki aap mujhe PAN card aur deal bhej dijiyega mai aapko yaha pe TDS ka like refund initiate karwa deti hu.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aap matlab ki aapke accounts team se baat kar rahe ho aap? Okay ma'am. Ha accounts se hi bol rahe hai.
Executive: Accha accounts team se hai aap. Chaliye thik hai koi baat nahi aap bhej dijiye mai aapke ticket open kar deti hu thik hai. Dusra number hai na office ka unse usko bhej denge ha dekh lijiye.
Executive: Koi baat nahi koi baat nahi thik hai ma'am. To ek baat bataiye ye jo aapka feedback tha wo mai close kar du baki ka aap se koi bhi aapko koi bhi kuch puchna raha mujhse to aap mujhse WhatsApp pe coordinate kar lijiyega jo number maine aapko diya hai na usko wahi pe aapko reply karke bata dungi ki kya process hai aapka.
Customer: Ha okay.
Executive: Thik hai aapka ye ticket close kar du ma'am mai?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Thik hai aapke paas ek mail jayega feedback ke liye to aap usse satisfy kar dijiyega baki ka aap detail bhej dijiye wo mai aapko update karwa deti hu.
Customer: Ha okay.
Executive: Aur koi bhi issue aata hai aapko jo maine number diya hai WhatsApp pe us number pe call kar lijiyega ma'am wo calling number hai.
Customer: Ha okay.
Executive: Okay ma'am. Thank you ma'am.
Customer: Ha.
summary:
Concerns:

- TDS refund not received for 2024-25.

- Wants to know the status of the refund.



Resolution:

- Executive created a ticket for refund.

- Asked to share PAN card and bank details.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send PAN and bank details.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, tds, pan card, bank details
